TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Connector extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 表示工作流设计图面上两个活动设计器之间的连接器。

span.span: Represents a connector between two activity designers on a workflow design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 连接器是显示在工作流设计图面上的线条，它将一个活动设计器连接到另一个活动设计器。A connector is the line that appears on a workflow design surface that connects one activity designer to another. 提供了一些方法和属性，可用于自定义在设计期间呈现活动设计器时绘制一组连接器的方式。 provides methods and properties that allow you to customize how to draw a set of connectors when an activity designer is rendered at design time.

summary.span: 用于在将连接器从一种状态拖到另一种状态时绘制连接器。

span.span: Used for drawing the Connector when it is dragged from one state to another.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户创建连接器、移动中心点或将终结点从一个活动移到另一个活动时，会调用此方法。This method is called when a user is creating a connector, moving a middle point or moving an endpoint from one activity to another.
